headline: Ask HN: What are some good “goto” React codebases?
description:
Hi HN,

Do you have any public React code-bases that you look to as good examples of a large project?

One that comes to mind for me is https://github.com/twilio/twilio-video-app-react. It's TypeScript, has good test coverage, a good folder structure and more.

I'm onboarding some junior developers, and would like to show them some well-developed practices that are not just Medium-esque articles.

Thank you.
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 有哪些好的 "goto "React代码库？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 有哪些好的 "goto "React代碼庫？
description_zh-Hans:
Hi HN,

你有什么公开的React代码库可以作为大型项目的好例子吗？

我想到的一个是https://github.com/twilio/twilio-video-app-react。

我正在招收一些初级开发人员，并希望向他们展示一些成熟的做法，而不仅仅是Medium-esque文章。
description_zh-Hant:
Hi HN,

你有什麼公開的React代碼庫可以作為大型項目的好例子嗎？

我想到的一個是https://github.com/twilio/twilio-video-app-react。

我正在招收一些初級開發人員，並希望向他們展示一些成熟的做法，而不僅僅是Medium-esque文章。
